DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether the administration of allodepleted donor T cells to patients with haematological malignancies after stem cell transplant can improve the recovery of the patients immune system.
DOC.brief_title: Infusion of Depleted T Cells Following Unrelated Donor Stem Cell Transplant (ICAT)
